name: @sap/cds-compiler
description: CDS (Core Data Services) compiler and backends
author: SAP SE (https://www.sap.com)

scripts.xmakeBeforeInstall: echo "Due to binary mirror, use sqlite 5.1.2 explicitly" && npm install --save --save-exact --no-package-lock sqlite3@5.1.2
scripts.xmakePrepareRelease: echo "$(node scripts/stripReadme.js README.md)" > README.md && node scripts/assertSnapshotVersioning.js && node scripts/assertChangelog.js && node scripts/cleanup.js --remove-dev
scripts.test: node scripts/verifyGrammarChecksum.js && mocha --reporter min --reporter-option maxDiffSize=0 scripts/testLazyLoading.js && mocha --parallel --reporter min --reporter-option maxDiffSize=0 test/ test3/
scripts.test3: node scripts/verifyGrammarChecksum.js && node scripts/linter/lintTests.js test3/ && mocha --reporter-option maxDiffSize=0 scripts/linter/lintMessages.js test3/
scripts.testmigration: npm install --no-save @sap/hana-client@2.3.123 @sap/hdi-deploy@3.10.0 && node scripts/verifyGrammarChecksum.js && cross-env TESTMIGRATION='TRUE' mocha
scripts.testall: npm install --no-save @sap/hana-client@2.3.123 @sap/hdi-deploy@3.10.0 && node scripts/verifyGrammarChecksum.js && cross-env TESTDB='TRUE' TESTMIGRATION='TRUE' mocha
scripts.coverage: cross-env nyc mocha --reporter-option maxDiffSize=0 test/ test3/ && nyc report --reporter=lcov
scripts.lint: eslint bin/ benchmark/ lib/ test/ test3/ scripts/ types/ && node scripts/linter/lintGrammar.js && node scripts/linter/lintTests.js test3/ && node scripts/linter/lintMessageIdCoverage.js lib/ && markdownlint README.md CHANGELOG.md doc/ internalDoc/ && cd share/messages && markdownlint .
scripts.generateAllRefs: node scripts/verifyGrammarChecksum.js && cross-env MAKEREFS='true' mocha --reporter-option maxDiffSize=0 test/ test3/
